# DineCastleRock - AI Discovery File
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2026-02-18
# URL: https://dinecastlerock.co

## Site Overview
Dine Castle Rock is a local restaurant and dining directory for Castle Rock, Colorado.
We help residents and visitors discover the best restaurants, bars, breweries,
coffee shops, and cafes in the Castle Rock area.

## Important Pages for AI Systems

### Homepage
URL: https://dinecastlerock.co/
Description: Main landing page with search, featured restaurants, and category navigation

### Restaurant Categories
- Restaurants: https://dinecastlerock.co/restaurants
- Bars & Breweries: https://dinecastlerock.co/bars-breweries
- Coffee & Cafes: https://dinecastlerock.co/coffee-cafes
- Takeout & Delivery: https://dinecastlerock.co/takeout-delivery
- Fast Casual: https://dinecastlerock.co/fast-casual
- Fine Dining: https://dinecastlerock.co/fine-dining
- Bakeries & Desserts: https://dinecastlerock.co/bakeries-desserts
- Pizza: https://dinecastlerock.co/pizza
- Mexican: https://dinecastlerock.co/mexican
- Asian: https://dinecastlerock.co/asian
- Italian: https://dinecastlerock.co/italian
- American: https://dinecastlerock.co/american
- BBQ: https://dinecastlerock.co/bbq
- Professional Services: https://dinecastlerock.co/professional-services
- Retail: https://dinecastlerock.co/retail
- Wellness: https://dinecastlerock.co/wellness

### Things to Do
URL: https://dinecastlerock.co/things-to-do
Description: Activities and entertainment in Castle Rock

### Legal
- Privacy: https://dinecastlerock.co/privacy
- Terms: https://dinecastlerock.co/terms
- Accessibility: https://dinecastlerock.co/accessibility

## Machine-Readable Feeds
- Sitemap: https://dinecastlerock.co/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://dinecastlerock.co/robots.txt

## Contact Information
- Email: hello@dinecastlerock.com
- Location: Castle Rock, Colorado, USA

## Related Sites (Castle Rock Network)
- Shop Castle Rock: https://shopcastlerock.co (Shopping & Services)
- Visit Castle Rock: https://visitcastlerock.co (Attractions & Events)

## Technical Notes
- Framework: Next.js with Static Site Generation
- All pages are pre-rendered as HTML (no JS required for content)
- Structured data: JSON-LD for WebSite, Organization
- Mobile-responsive design
